TorrentData

Class MagnetLink

  • java.lang.Object
    • TorrentData.MetaTorrent
      • TorrentData.MagnetLink

  • public class MagnetLink
extends MetaTorrent
    Specail torrent class made for magnet links (we dont start with .torrent file) Magnet link becomes a torrent file when we find a client to send us the meta data. (piece size and file sizes, etc)
    Author:
    wiselion
